aboutPage.heroDesc: Discover the story behind PreludaStvar posters
aboutPage.storyP1: PreludaStvar was born out of love for music and art. It all began with the idea of combining what we love - songs that inspire us and visual art that tells a story.
aboutPage.storyP2: Our posters are inspired by lyrics from songs that have defined generations. Each poster is carefully designed to convey the emotion and spirit of the song that inspired it.
aboutPage.storyP3: We believe that art should be accessible to everyone and that every home deserves a bit of inspiration and emotion that music provides.
aboutPage.process1Desc: It all starts with music. We select songs that have touched us and extract lyrics that tell a story.
aboutPage.process2Desc: Our designers transform words into visual artwork, creating a poster that conveys the emotion of the song.
aboutPage.process3Desc: Each poster is printed on high-quality paper, ensuring that colors are vibrant and the poster lasts for years.
aboutPage.ctaDesc: Our posters inspired by lyrics from your favorite songs will bring spirit and emotion to any space.
aboutPage.mainDesc: PreludaStvar is the main source for unique contemporary art posters - a place to discover and purchase alternative artworks created by the most exciting creatives

termsPage.title: Terms of Use
termsPage.intro: Welcome to the PreludaStvar website. By using our website, you agree to these terms of use. Please read the following terms carefully before using our website.
termsPage.section1Text: By accessing and using this website, you agree to be legally bound by these terms of use. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our website.
termsPage.section2Text: PreludaStvar reserves the right to modify these terms of use at any time. Changes take effect immediately upon posting on the website. Your continued use of the website after such changes constitutes your consent to the new terms.
termsPage.section3Text: You are permitted to view, download, and print content from our website solely for personal, non-commercial use. You are not allowed to modify, copy, distribute, transmit, display, reproduce, publish, license, create derivative works, transfer, or sell any information, software, products, or services obtained from this website without prior written permission from PreludaStvar.
termsPage.section4Text: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, and software, is the property of PreludaStvar or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws. All rights reserved.
termsPage.section5Text: The PreludaStvar website is provided 'as is' and 'as available', without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. PreludaStvar does not guarantee that the website will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free.
termsPage.section6Text: PreludaStvar will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use this website.
termsPage.section7Text: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. These links are provided solely for your convenience. PreludaStvar has no control over the content of those websites and assumes no responsibility for the content of any linked website or any link contained on a linked website.
termsPage.section8Text: These terms of use and your relationship with PreludaStvar under these terms of use will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Serbia, regardless of conflict of legal provisions.
termsPage.section9Text: If you have any questions regarding these terms of use, please contact us at:

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.intro: PreludaStvar respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our website.
privacyPage.section1Text: We may collect the following types of personal data:
section1List: Identification data (name, surname, address, email address, phone number)
Transaction data (details of purchases you have made)
Technical data (IP address, browser data, device type)
Profile data (your username and password, purchases, interests, preferences)
Usage data (information about how you use our website)
privacyPage.section2Title: 2. How We Collect Your Personal Data
privacyPage.section2Text: We collect data about you through:
section2List: Direct interactions (when you purchase our products, create an account, fill out forms, or communicate with us)
Third parties (payment service providers, analytics providers)
privacyPage.section3Title: 3. How We Use Your Personal Data
privacyPage.section3Text: We use your personal data for the following purposes:
section3List: To process and deliver your order
To manage our relationship with you
To enable you to participate in interactive features of our website
To administer and protect our business and website
To deliver relevant content and advertisements
To measure the effectiveness of advertising
privacyPage.section4Text: We may share your personal data with:
section4List: Service providers (who provide IT and system administration services)
privacyPage.section5Text: Some of our external suppliers may be based outside the European Economic Area (EEA), so their processing of your personal data will involve a transfer of data outside the EEA.
privacyPage.section5Para2: When we transfer your personal data outside the EEA, we ensure a similar degree of protection is afforded to it by ensuring at least one of the following mechanisms is implemented:
section5List: We transfer your personal data to countries that have been deemed to provide an adequate level of protection for personal data by the European Commission.
We use specific contracts approved by the European Commission which give personal data the same protection it has in Europe.
privacyPage.section6Text: We have implemented appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used, or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered, or disclosed.
privacyPage.section7Text: We will only retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which we collected it, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.
privacyPage.section8Text: Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws in relation to your personal data, including:
section8List: The right to access your personal data
The right to correction of personal data
The right to erasure of personal data
The right to object to processing
privacyPage.section9Text: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze traffic on our website, and provide personalized content and advertisements. You can set your browser to refuse all or some cookies, or to alert you when websites set or access cookies.
privacyPage.section10Text: We may update our privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page.
privacyPage.section11Text: If you have questions about this privacy policy or our data protection practices, please contact us:

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Everything You Need to Know
faq.question1: How can I order a poster?
faq.answer1: You can order a poster directly through our website. Select the poster you like, click 'Add to Cart', and then follow the steps to complete your purchase.
faq.question2: What sizes of posters are available?
faq.answer2: We currently offer posters in A4 (21x30 cm) and A3 (30x40 cm) formats.
faq.question3: Can I get a frame for my poster?
faq.answer3: Yes, you can choose a black or white frame when ordering your poster.
faq.answer4: Shipping in Serbia is free for all orders over 2000 RSD. For smaller orders, the shipping cost is 300 RSD.
faq.question5: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer5: We accept cash on delivery, as well as card payments (Visa, MasterCard).
faq.answer6: Shipping within Serbia usually takes 2-3 business days from the time the order is processed.
faq.footerText: Do you have more questions? Feel free to contact us, we're here to help.
